So the boys down in marketing say I have to put in a review for this game, and you know what I say to that >REDACTED< Why do I have to review something everyone knows is great? Because it's a damn good game, that's why. I Would recommend to anyone looking to exercise their puzzle solving skills and spend some time with hard core, no beating around the bush science! To all astronauts, athletes, and heroes out there, this IS the game for you. Nothing says recreation more like taking down A.I and continuing the mantle of science. I pick up my controller, turn this thing on, and hell! I make a happy face!

JUEGUEN EL PORTAL 1 PRIMERO, X LA SHUSHA

Yes yes yes.  That is all you need to know.  If you haven't played this, why?  Do it now.  Portal 2 is basically perfect.  It is priced so well, and it is honestly a pretty short game.  I finished it in around 20 hours, but it took me about a week (cause I have no free time) but literally, the graphics, the story line, the improvement from Portal.  Amazing.  Impressive.  Absolutely outstanding.  This game absolutely deserves everything it gets.  GLaDOS is such a hot villain, and just the whole story is insanely impressive and just SO GOOD.  Its just- buy it.  Buy it.  Buy it right now.  You need this, I promise.  Although this game is a little hard, and there were sometimes where I was stuck, it only takes a little bit of logical thinking (which I don't have) to find out what you have to do.  Overall 9/10.  (BTW SOUNDTRACK IS SO GOOD)

Amazing sequel. While the atmosphere and story aren't as great as the first game, the writing and humor are superb. I still like the original just a tiny bit more, but this is still one of the best games ever made. The co-op and test builder are amazing additions too.

Fantastic game, such a clever concept and the difficulty is just right. Hard enough to challenge you a bit towards the latter levels but not so much that it's annoying.

Highly recommended. Wish there was sequel.
